Module com.example.wgusoftware1
Package com.example.wgusoftware1

Class InventoryManagementController

java.lang.Object
com.example.wgusoftware1.InventoryManagementController
public class InventoryManagementController extends Object
This class is the controller for the Inventory Management System GUI. It handles all the user input and data interactions between the GUI and the Inventory class.

    • OKDialogue

      public static Boolean OKDialogue(String ActionTitle, String ActionMessage)
      Displays a confirmation dialog with a custom title and message.
      Parameters:
      ActionTitle - the title of the dialog box
      ActionMessage - the message to display in the dialog box
      Returns:
      true if the user clicked the "OK" button, false otherwise

    • ErrorDialogue

      public static void ErrorDialogue(String ActionTitle, String ActionMessage)

      Parameters:
      ActionTitle - the title of the dialog box
      ActionMessage - the message to display in the dialog box

    • getNextPartId

      public static int getNextPartId()
      statically retrieves the next valid part id. this was implemented because initially part and prod id's were generated by getting the inentory collection length for either product or part and adding 1. however on reflection deleting a part and adding a new one may result in duplicate id's thus i separated that function
      Returns:
      returns the current value of nextPartId

    • getNextProdId

      public static int getNextProdId()
      statically retrieves the next valid part id. this was implemented because initially part and prod id's were generated by getting the inentory collection length for either product or part and adding 1. however on reflection deleting a part and adding a new one may result in duplicate id's thus i separated that function
      Returns:
      returns the current value of nextProdId

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded. Initializes the parts and products tables by setting the items and cell value factories for each column in the table.
